segments.text: Hey . Owen ! Have you gone on your family vacation yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . I got so tired . My son began to cry the moment we got on the train . It was very embarrassing because we took the over-night train and the noise made it difficult for other people in the cabin to sleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Didn't you bring his favorite toy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we did . Fortunately we put his Teddy Bear in the bag , and finally he fell asleep at mid-night with it in his arms .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where did you go ? You've got a beautiful tan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My wife didn't like to go to amusement parks , so we compromised and finally went to the seaside . I think vacation in summer is not good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must have had a great time . Most children love to play in the sand on the beach and go swimming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , he was every excited to see the blue sea and picked up many seashells to give as gift for his classmates in kindergarten .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: His friends will be very happy to get the little souvenir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I taught him how to swim in the sea . It was fun and made him braver than before . After we returned home , he wasn't afraid to sleep alone in his bedroom .
segments.speaker: S2
